description:
Essay Writer is a writing tool for students, it is designed to improve organising and writing skills in an easy-to-use and accessible format.


Which editions are affected?
1. All editions: IdeaMapper Desktop Cloud, IdeaMapperPro, IdeaMapperK12, IdeaMapperHigherEd and EssayWriter.
How to get this release?
1. For desktop installations: Go to https://ideamapper.com, follow HelpDesk and download links for your platform, download the installer file, then install. The previous version will be upgraded.
2. For the webapp: Clear the browser cache, then go to https://webapp.ideamapper.com, and log in with the same credentials.
What’s New?
- No additional features.
Bug Fixes?
- Fixes a problem with the Windows installer which resulted in an error being displayed if a newer visual studio c++ runtime was detected.
- Fixes a problem closing a print preview window when frameless windows are enabled.
- Fixes an issue where the user could not drop certain URLs into the app.
- Fixes issues in IdeaMapperPro where calls to the local AI would fail.
- Minor fixes.
